author: newsr.in
title: Verizon Working with Motorola to Fix Activation Issues with Moto X Pure Edition
text: We reported last week that Verizon Wireless confirmed customers will be able to easily activate their unlocked Motorola Moto X Pure Edition devices on its network. The information has been confirmed by the carrier, but it looks like in reality things are a little bit different. After stating that “customers who pur... »
